author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Agoda.com offers superb accommodation deals in Singapore to mark 50 years of independenceTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Agoda.com offers superb accommodation deals in Singapore to mark 50 years of independence Published on : Thursday, July 16, 2015
Agoda.com, one of Asia’s leading hotel booking sites and part of Nasdaq-listed Priceline Group, is presenting a list of accommodations in Singapore offering special discounts of up to 55% for SG50, the 50th anniversary of the country’s independence. But hurry – the booking period only lasts from 17 – 19 July, 2015.
Singapore’s quality of life is consistently rated the highest in Asia. With the third-highest per-capita GDP in the world, travelers are drawn by the city’s cosmopolitan vibe, varied, multi-ethnic communities, and futuristic skyline. And let’s not forget about the amazing food from all around the world.
To mark its 50th birthday, Singapore is preparing to celebrate with a variety of events and activities. There are exhibitions that explore the multicultural Singaporean identity, as well as events at the Singapore Botanic Gardens, which have just been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Museums are pulling out all the stops to provide unique insights into the past, present, and future, while music and multimedia performances around the island are sure to impress. There are activities for kids, sports competitions, parades, fireworks, and more chances to experience the island’s famous food than you will have room for.
Source:- Agoda.com
